attributes.action: Labour broke key promises, country needs fresh mandate, new election now
attributes.additional_details: We demand a new general election. Labour has broken key pledges on green investment, scrapping the two-child benefit cap, free school meals, House of Lords reform, and nationalisation. Keir Starmer is not up to the job, nor are Angela Rayner or Rachel Reeves. Ministers are unqualified, public funds are being wasted, and trust has collapsed. The public has lost confidence in this government. We need a fresh mandate and leadership that keeps its promises and puts the country first.
attributes.background: We demand a new general election. Labour broke promises on green investment, the two-child benefit cap, free school meals, House of Lords reform, and nationalisation. Money is being wasted and unqualified ministers hold key roles. The public deserves honesty and competence in government.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
